<a id="class_CollisionShape2D"></a>

# CollisionShape2D

**Inherits:** [Node2D](class_node2d.md) **<** [CanvasItem](class_canvasitem.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A node that provides a [Shape2D](class_shape2d.md) to a [CollisionObject2D](class_collisionobject2d.md) parent.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A node that provides a [Shape2D](class_shape2d.md) to a [CollisionObject2D](class_collisionobject2d.md) parent and allows to edit it. This can give a detection shape to an [Area2D](class_area2d.md) or turn a [PhysicsBody2D](class_physicsbody2d.md) into a solid object.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Physics introduction](../tutorials/physics/physics_introduction.md)

- [2D Dodge The Creeps Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2712)

- [2D Pong Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2728)

- [2D Kinematic Character Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2719)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_CollisionShape2D_property_debug_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](class_color.md) **debug_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#class_CollisionShape2D_property_debug_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_debug_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](class_color.md)\ )
- [Color](class_color.md) **get_debug_color**\ (\ )

The collision shape color that is displayed in the editor, or in the running project if **Debug > Visible Collision Shapes** is checked at the top of the editor.

\ **Note:** The default value is [ProjectSettings.debug/shapes/collision/shape_color](class_projectsettings.md#class_ProjectSettings_property_debug/shapes/collision/shape_color). The ``Color(0, 0, 0, 0)`` value documented here is a placeholder, and not the actual default debug color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CollisionShape2D_property_disabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **disabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CollisionShape2D_property_disabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_disabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_disabled**\ (\ )

A disabled collision shape has no effect in the world. This property should be changed with [Object.set_deferred()](class_object.md#class_Object_method_set_deferred).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CollisionShape2D_property_one_way_collision"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **one_way_collision** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CollisionShape2D_property_one_way_collision)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_one_way_collision**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_one_way_collision_enabled**\ (\ )

Sets whether this collision shape should only detect collision on one side (top or bottom).

\ **Note:** This property has no effect if this **CollisionShape2D** is a child of an [Area2D](class_area2d.md) node.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CollisionShape2D_property_one_way_collision_margin"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **one_way_collision_margin** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_CollisionShape2D_property_one_way_collision_margin)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_one_way_collision_margin**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_one_way_collision_margin**\ (\ )

The margin used for one-way collision (in pixels). Higher values will make the shape thicker, and work better for colliders that enter the shape at a high velocity.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CollisionShape2D_property_shape"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Shape2D](class_shape2d.md) **shape** [ðŸ”—](#class_CollisionShape2D_property_shape)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_shape**\ (\ value\: [Shape2D](class_shape2d.md)\ )
- [Shape2D](class_shape2d.md) **get_shape**\ (\ )

The actual shape owned by this collision shape.
